front.title: Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) IPv4 and IPv6 Option for a Location Uniform Resource Identifier (URI)

abstract.t: This document creates a Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP) Option for the downloading of a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) pointing to the geolocation record of an endpoint. This URI, called a Location-by-Reference (LbyR), points to a record on a location server which tracks the geolocation of the endpoint. Once downloaded by an endpoint, this LbyR can be forwarded to another entity, to be dereferenced if this entity wants to learn the geolocation of the sender endpoint.
